creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; golden brown with black linear designs; various motifs with groups of three parallel lines as background, in regular band, and as part of freeform stepped design; one quadrant has black predominately triangular forms
title: Barkcloth panel
